From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...>


>Ok, one quick question.  Will the same scenario editor for Gladiator
>work for G:BF?  If so, what scenario numbers will be open?  Can anyone
>of us registered users create some scenarios that will be pre-included
>  in the G:BF?  If so, I might be willing to work on some 'normal'
>scenarios for the future game.

G:BF uses a slightly different file system than Glad 3.x; however, there's 
also an included, modified version of the scenario editor that takes all 
that into account .. it should be in the zip file, along with lots of other 
crud in that particular zip that I didn't get a chance to filter out tonight.

Right now, no numbers are hard-set for the scenario levels; we've been 
playing around in the 100-120 region, just "because," .. rather than for 
any reason .. eventually we'll work everything back to a coherent set, but 
anything you want to work with in terms of numbers is fine (it's always 
easy to shift a set of levels later if need be).

--Tom
